INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: There was an error on the server
COULD_NOT_SEND_OTP_CODE: Failed to sent OTP, please make sure that the number is valid
INVALID_OTP_CODE: The code you entered is invalid or already expired!
MERCHANT_EXISTS_AND_CANNOT_BE_ONBOARDED: Merchant already exists and cannot be onboarded
COULD_NOT_VERIFY_OTP_CODE: Failed to verify OTP code, please try again
OWNERS_OWNERSHIP_REQUIRED_PERCENTAGE_NOT: In order to continue, you need to add owners until you reach at least a majority ownership
NO_TOKEN_RETURNED: There was an issue validating the OTP, please try again
COULD_NOT_CREATE_LEAD_ALREADY_EXISTS: Could not create, please contact CS
Bad Request: There are issues with the information you provided, please check and try again
ADDRESS_NOT_VALID: The address you entered is not valid, please check and try again
INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: The phone number you entered is not valid, please check and try again
INVALID_MCC_CODE: The category or subcategory you selected is not valid, please check and try again
UNAUTHORIZED: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue
FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource
INVALID_ABA_NUMBER: The routing number you entered is not valid, please check and try again
NUMBER_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_TO_ANOTHER_LEA: The number you entered is already in use, please contact CS
ATTRIBUTION_LEAD_NOT_FOUND: There was an issue with the data you provided, please contact CS
NUMBER_NOT_MATCHING_LEAD_CONTACT_DATA: The number you entered does not match the url information provided, please check and try again
